# start()

**Instance Method**

Starts the sequencer’s player.

## Declaration

```swift
func start() throws
```

## Discussion

If you don’t call [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSequencer/prepareToPlay()], the framework calls it and then starts the player.

## Operating an Audio Sequencer

- **prepareToPlay()**: Gets ready to play the sequence by prerolling all events.
- **stop()**: Stops the sequencer’s player.
